snippet: With a second Wimbledon title in the bag, a second gold medal in his pocket and his biggest rival struggling with injury, Andy Murray believes he has a golden chance to add to his three grand slam titles....
lead_paragraph: With a second Wimbledon title in the bag, a second gold medal in his pocket and his biggest rival struggling with injury, Andy Murray believes he has a golden chance to add to his three grand slam titles.

headline.print_headline: Murray Keen to Win Another Grand Slam Before Turning 30
headline.main: Murray Keen to Win Another Grand Slam Before Turning 30
